title: Employment (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No. 2) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities (Safety
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities (Safety 

of Toys) (Amendment) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations, other than Regulation 4, shall come into operation on 

20 May 2021. 

(3) Regulation 4 shall come into operation on 21 May 2021.

title: Employment (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No. 2) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: 3. The Principal Regulations are amended -
text_raw:
3. The Principal Regulations are amended - 

(a) 

in Regulation 4(1) - 

(i) 

by the insertion of the following definition: 

“ ‘European act’ means an act adopted by an institution of 
the European Union or an institution of the European 
Communities;”, and 

(ii) by the substitution of the following definition for the 

definition of “Toy Safety Directive”: 

“ ‘Toy Safety Directive’ means Directive 2009/48/EC of 
the European Parliament and of the Council of 18 June 
20091 as amended by the European acts specified in 
Schedule 1;”, 

(b) by the substitution of “Schedule 2” for “the Schedule” in each 

place that it occurs, 

(c) 

by the insertion of the following Schedule: 

1 OJ L 170, 30.6.2009, p.1 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st May, 2021.

Regulation 4 

“Schedule 1 

Toy Safety Directive

title: Employment (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No. 2) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

These Regulations give effect to two Commission Directives (Directive 
2019/1922/EU of 18 November 2019 and Directive 2019/1929/EU of 19 
November 2019). Directive 2019/1922/EU amends point 13 of part III of Annex 
II of the Toys Safety Directive (Council Directive 2009/48/EC of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 18 June 2009 on the Safety of Toys), regarding 
the migration limits for aluminium from toys or components of toys. Directive 
2019/1929/EU amends Appendix C to Annex II of the Toys Safety Directive for 
the purpose of adopting specific limit values for chemicals used in certain toys, 
as regards formaldehyde. 

 
 
 
 
 
 6 [249]
